TextBlock.Text: QUIAX: Uh, what? As far as I know, there should be no interference to have caused that.
NYLOX: Perhaps it was from the radiation?
QUIAX: It couldn't have been the radiation. Zephyria's magnetic field is strong. Plus, there was that creepy message.
OYVAR: Hey everyone! How's the gateway going?
QUIAX: Erm... it failed miserably. We need to build another megastructure.
OYVAR: Another megastructure?! Remember what happened to the HelioRings?
NYLOX: Oh come on, that was only a fluke. We can do better this time.
QUIAX: Here's what I have in mind: a <color=orange>space station out past Teraxia</color>. It will be dedicated space specifically to researching the Ghost Moon. We WILL crack this moon's code!
